ccache mpicxx -fPIC  -fmessage-length=0 -O3 -DNDEBUG -march=native -ftree-vectorize   -shared -Wl,-soname,libmpi2.so -o libmpi2.so CMakeFiles/mpi2.dir/env_impl.cc.o CMakeFiles/mpi2.dir/init_impl.cc.o CMakeFiles/mpi2.dir/logger_impl.cc.o CMakeFiles/mpi2.dir/registry_impl.cc.o CMakeFiles/mpi2.dir/task-manager_impl.cc.o -L/home/chteflio/localW/lib /home/chteflio/localW/lib/libboost_serialization.so /home/chteflio/localW/lib/libboost_mpi.so /home/chteflio/localW/lib/libboost_thread.so -lpthread /home/chteflio/localW/lib/libboost_program_options.so /home/chteflio/localW/lib/libboost_regex.so /home/chteflio/localW/lib/libboost_filesystem.so /home/chteflio/localW/lib/libboost_chrono.so -llog4cxx -Wl,-rpath,/home/chteflio/localW/lib:
